message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I'm very interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth considerably more to me. How about we settle at $18,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can you meet me at this price?
